name: stupid love
content: And I knew it from the first kiss
That our love won't be the same
I was low and I was love sick
Till you took away the pain
And our walks along the beach
I guess we didn't even have to
I wish we didn't even have to
Like looking at my own reflection
With your love and your affection
I don't feel like I'm insane
All I need is you baby
With you it feels like fate
Knowing it was you and me
I just wanna turn back time
And I'm hoping we go back baby
Like looking at my own reflection
There's just one look in your eyes
I wanna be by your side
From now until we get old
No one can make me feel this high
Like looking at my own reflection
